content:
@WG-prioritization/alerts issue #90687 has been requested for prioritization.

Procedure

  • Priority?
  • Regression?
  • Notify people/groups?
  • Needs I-nominated?
I don't think this is the correct way of using prioritization, a high priority PR is marked with p= when merging instead of going through P- labels.
@Gary Guo p= is a signal of "how soon should this land after being approved", not "is it important"
@pnkfelix mentioned a while back that "PRs are just issues with code attached" and I agree with that to an extent
that said I'm not sure if wg-prioritization is the right group here, it seems like a question for t-lang
It ended up here because rustbot attached the I-prioritize label. But, yes, I think it's out of scope here, it's not a regression. We take care of regressions (iiuc)

apiraino said:

It ended up here because rustbot attached the I-prioritize label. But, yes, I think it's out of scope here, it's not a regression. We take care of regressions (iiuc)

We take care of any bugs, not just regressions, but yeah, this PR is out of scope
